SummaryEnglish: Junk Dog, an underground fighter with the alias of "Gearless Joe" sets out to join the worlds most prestigious mecha boxing championship, Megalonia.

4.SummaryEnglish: New short anime included in the BD box set.

1.SummaryEnglish: In the run-down slums of a futuristic city, the boxer only known as Junk Dog is making a living throwing fights for the mob in underground arenas. That all changes when he has a chance encounter with the champion, Yuri.

2.SummaryEnglish: Yuri has sought Junk Dog out to test his mettle in the ring, and their encounter will leave the underground fighter a changed man.

3.SummaryEnglish: Nanbu and Joe are preparing for their first official match, but in order to do that, they'll need to find a decent set of Gear first. While searching, they run into a group of orphan boys, thieving their way through life.

4.SummaryEnglish: Nanbu and Joe decide to make the ultimate gamble to get into Megalonia: Joe is going to be fighting without any kind Gear. Can a gearless boxer really survive in a sport designed to showcase the cybernetic enhancements?

5.SummaryEnglish: Nanbu's old fighter, Aragaki, has returned to the ring a changed man. And he has a vendetta against his old trainer... one that might cost Joe his life.

6.SummaryEnglish: Joe's fight with Aragaki continues, as Joe sticks with Nanbu's training and his strong will to hold on.

7.SummaryEnglish: There's one month until Megalonia begins, and it looks like Shirato Yukiko's brother, Mikio, is a lock for the final entrant into the tournament. Will Joe and Team Nowhere find a way to secure their spot in the Megalo Box championship tournament?

8.SummaryEnglish: Shirato Mikio has forced Team Nowhere to forfeit a match by threatening to expose Joe and Nanbu's seedy past. Will their dream of making it into the Megalonia tournament ever come true?

9.TitleEnglish: A Dead Flower Shall Never Bloom
9.SummaryEnglish: It's man vs machine, as "Gearless" Joe squares off against Shirato Mikio, who is guided by Ace, an artificial intelligence of his own design.

10.SummaryEnglish: Crime boss Fujimaki has decided that Team Nowhere needs to throw their opening match in Megalonia in order to repay their debt to him. Can the team survive this blow to their ambitions? And even if they do, and Joe wins, will they survive the gangster's wrath?

11.SummaryEnglish: Joe faces off against the bloody lion, Glen Burroughs. If he wants his friends to live, he'll have to throw the match. After coming this far... is there nothing else Team Nowhere can do?

12.TitleEnglish: Leap Over the Edge of Death
12.SummaryEnglish: Inspired by Joe's meteoric rise, and wanting to face him in a fair fight, Yuri makes a decision that will change everything for himself and Yukiko.

13.SummaryEnglish: Joe has risen to the top and finally gets his chance of a rematch with Yuri. Yuri himself also feels joy in his chance to fight with Joe. The final battle begins!

2.SummaryEnglish:
Seven years later, Joe now goes by "Nomad" and keeps a low profile, occasionally fighting in a few underground matches to get by. He is haunted by hallucinations and relies on a set of painkillers to numb his mind.

During a match, Joe wins against an opponent, Chief, who purposefully loses for some extra cash from gamblers. Subsequently, Joe discovers that Chief is from a community of immigrants called the Casa. Chief is gradually trying to make enough money to purchase the land where they live illegally. At first, Joe hesitates to get involved, but eventually decides to lend the Casa a helping hand.

1.SummaryEnglish: Years after his victory at Megalonia, Joe has become a completely different man, going from one underground ring to another, now fighting as the wandering boxer Nomad.

2.TitleEnglish: Despair brings courage to the cowardly
2.SummaryEnglish: Joe gets his motorcycle stolen by a boy named Mio and ends up at a settlement for immigrants where he runs into Chief again.

3.TitleEnglish: If you desire the illness of the root rot then do not cover the drainage hole of the pot
3.SummaryEnglish: Joe helps Chief get ready to fight in the upcoming tournament while dealing with is own demons.

4.TitleEnglish: Love cannot be lost if a flower of the soul blooms
4.SummaryEnglish: Chief fights in the last match of the tournament. Will he be victorious?

5.TitleEnglish: The promised land answered that there is no messiah
5.SummaryEnglish: Joe heads back home to face his past.

6.TitleEnglish: Though you admit yourself to be powerless, still God offers his image to be stepped on
6.SummaryEnglish: Sachio ends up injuring a Megalo-boxer after they caused trouble at Bonjiri's shop. In retaliation, the Megalo-boxer comes back and trashes the place and steals the deed to the shop.

7.TitleEnglish: The Fool that the card signifies is not a halfwit jester
7.SummaryEnglish: Liu finds out Joe is back in town and asks him to be his sparring partner. Mac Rosario had once lost everything, but made a miraculous comeback as the local hero.

8.TitleEnglish: Rainbow's trajectory draws an arc at the beginning of the end
8.SummaryEnglish: Mac and Liu face off in the ring finally. Maya goes to talk to Sakuma after she finds Mac acting strange.

9.TitleEnglish: The way in which to live cannot be counted on one hand, even still there are ways to survive
9.SummaryEnglish: Joe continues to try to rebuild Gym Nowhere and Yukiko has some questions for Sakuma about BES.

10.TitleEnglish: Past defeat is with the omen of good fortune
10.SummaryEnglish: The executives don't like Yukiko's decision to possibly end the company's partnership with ROSCO. Meanwhile, Joe and Sachio settle things once and for all.

11.TitleEnglish: When removing the armor that cannot be taken off, the seed of fortune and misfortune sprout
11.SummaryEnglish: It's decided that Mac and Joe will get into the ring together, but Mac finds out something shocking from Maya...

12.TitleEnglish: You can't erase the voice of the voiceless even after the applauds end
12.SummaryEnglish: Mac falls into despair when he finds out the truth and encounters a familiar face from his past.

13.TitleEnglish: Those with wings carry the wingless, Those without wings bless those with wings
13.SummaryEnglish: Joe and Mac head into the ring to have their legendary match.
